H3.text: Who wrote One-upmanship and The Theory and Practice of Gamesmanship. Lifemanship

A4.text: The term was first used in the title of a book by Stephen Potter, published in 1952 as a follow-up to The Theory and Practice of Gamesmanship (1947)
